title: A free update to WiiM’s cheap wireless high-res music streamer adds a great feature found on expensive streamers
description: A free upgrade to the WiiM Pro adds Roon Ready certification, making a great wireless music streamer even better

title: WhatsApp just made transferring chat history so easy but there may be one big limit
description: This update removes cloud transfer from the equation, but it appears the two phones may need to run the same OS.

title: Tom Clancy's The Division Resurgence release date, platforms, everything we know
description: Tom Clancy's The Division Resurgence is set to release later this year, and there's a lot to learn about its significance.

title: We found your AMD mid-range CPU but you better act fast
description: AMD is offering its mid-range Ryzen 5 5600X3D CPU, but only at a single retailer for a limited time.

title: Watching Netflix on your Google TV just got a long-awaited upgrade to match Apple TV
description: Netflix finally adds support for Google TV's framerate matching

title: Google just released a special edition Pixel Fold, but you can't buy it
description: Google has introduced a new and stylish variant of the Pixel Fold, but it's only available through the Gift from Google program.

title: RIP to the Surface Pro 6 - Microsoft has ended support for the stellar tablet
description: Surface Pro 6 users listen up - Microsoft will no longer support the tablet

title: This fake Telegram app is just riddled with malware
description: Unofficial apps are a good way to get your Android phone infected with malware.

title: Internet shutdowns are on the rise, a new tool measures their impact on economies
description: NetLoss promises to give "an unprecedented level of rigor and precision" able to go beyond a mere cost evaluation of internet shutdowns. Here's all you need to know.

title: Intel is biggest loser as cloud giant splashes billions of dollars on rivals
description: Arm startup emerges as billion dollar winner as cloud giant buys from Intel’s biggest rivals.

title: Powerful new Chromebook tablets are coming, and they could finally bridge the gap between laptops and tablets
description: A new board for Chrome tablets promises a significant uptick in performance, and I’m excited to see what it's capable of.

title: Microsoft Azure might not be quite as profitable as we all thought
description: Leaked court document details Microsoft Azure’s $34 billion revenue leading up to June 2022, leading to questions around its profitability.

title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Max, Prime Video and more this weekend (June 30)
description: From returning fantasy adventures to pulse-racing thriller series, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: Tidal plans to rollout another hi-res lossless audio format for HiFi Plus subscribers
description: Tidal's kept its promise: Hi-res FLAC is rolling out to its early access subscribers and coming to everybody else soon.

title: Businesses are being told to cut hardware spending, but many aren't backing down
description: IT decision-makers are buying higher-end devices in a hope that device refresh lifecycles can be extended.

title: Windows 11 gets a cool new look for a feature everyone uses – but nobody loves
description: Microsoft has just introduced Copilot in testing, but a change to the Settings app is almost as interesting (at least for now).

title: Windows 11 gets Copilot AI – but Microsoft might be ruining it already
description: Copilot’s initial form is rather unexciting, and also flirts with the idea of piping ads through to the user; please don’t, Microsoft.

title: Beats Studio Pro tipped to have the Apple AirPods Max's personalized spatial audio upgrade
description: Beats Studio Pro could have all the key features of AirPods Max for considerably less cash.

title: Just Dance 2024 release date, platforms, gameplay, songs, and everything we know so far
description: Just Dance 2024 is scheduled to arrive this October, but outside of a few tunes, there's still a lot to learn.

title: Annapurna Interactive is making a new Blade Runner game set between the two movies
description: Blade Runner 2033: Labyrinth is a brand new game set in the dystopian Los Angeles, made by Annapurna Interactive.

title: Over a million NHS users have data leaked following ransomware attack
description: Around 11 years of NHS patient data may have just been exposed in a ransomware attack.

title: Motorola's iPhone 14-beating comms tech turns any phone into a satellite phone, and you can buy it now
description: Motorola has launched its Motorola Defy Smartphone Satellite Link, which can turn any smartphone into a satellite phone.

title: Call of Duty introduces 'hallucinations' to mess with cheaters
description: Call of Duty's Ricochet anti-cheat system just got an update that's seriously messing with ill-intentioned players.

title: iPhone 15 Pro all but confirmed to get potentially game-changing design feature
description: The iPhone 15 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max are now all but confirmed to get titanium frames.

title: Meta wants to create a Facebook app store to compete with Apple's App Store and Google Play
description: Meta will soon let you download apps straight from within the Facebook app, just by clicking on ads.

title: Microsoft Office won't open since updating Windows? This company has fixed it
description: Recent Windows updates caused security software to block some Office and other apps.

title: Annoying Gmail change rolled back following user outcry
description: Gmail changes its notifications on Android once again following outcry.

title: The hunt for Diablo 4’s secret cow level continues despite setbacks from new patch
description: Diablo 4 players are continuing to scour the game for a secret cow level, but their search has been held back by a new patch.

title: Companies who force workers back to the office are losing a lot of key employees
description: RTO mandates are pushing workers away, and putting new talent off, but many companies think things are OK.

title: Hunt: Showdown achieves its biggest concurrent player base to date with new expansion
description: Hunt: Showdown has just achieved its biggest historic-ever player count as a new expansion has released.

description: RoboCop: Rogue City is finally getting a closed playtest that you sign up for right now, but there's no guarantee that you'll be let in.

description: Pokémon Go creator Niantic has confirmed it's canceled two games and laid off staff to refocus on the popular mobile title.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 will come to Xbox once the devs "overcome" technical hurdles
description: Baldur's Gate 3 will still be coming to Microsoft's consoles, but the developers are facing hardware challenges that'll keep Xbox fans waiting.

title: Businesses are set to spend billions on securing their 5G networks
description: Private 5G isn't secure by default, despite some companies clearly thinking that it is.

title: Microsoft's new AI shopping tools will create a buying guide just for you
